name: Cove USD
description: Welcome to Cove - the one-stop platform for earning onchain. The Cove Protocol pairs off-chain intelligence with on-chain automation to deliver curated 1-click DeFi vaults that earn higher, safer yield. - A simplified way to earn onchain that hides the complexity of best-in-class management. - Easy access to sophisticated strategies run by experts like Gauntlet. - Earns $1B+ in additional profit for LPs by eliminating loss-versus-rebalancing (LVR) using Programmatic Orders. - Better execution when internal trades are matched offchain by Coveâ€™s solver and settled without leaking value, like ring trades in batch auctions. Our first product coveUSD sets the benchmark for safe, diversified blue chip USD yield on Ethereum.
